thread.section_title: NZ Watch Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NZ Watch Store | nzwatchstore.co.nz
thread.title: Max Lawton
thread.title_full: NZ Watch Store reviewed by Max Lawton

author: Max Lawton
title: Max Lawton
text:
I had purchased a Michael Kors watch for $300+
Watch arrived late, Finally arrived after about week and half.
Watch had a flat battery, and even worse the second hand fell off.
Extremely disappointed for a so called 'Trusted website'
NZ Watch store purchases end off line watches, or ones that didn't sell. They then on sell it on their website for a 'discounted price'
Would NOT recommend buying from this annoying frustrating website.
